text: Hyperion is the name of a coast redwood tree (Sequoia sempervirens) in California, United States. It is the world's tallest known living tree, measuring 116.07 m (380.8 ft). Hyperion is estimated to be 600 to 800 years old. It was discovered on 25 August 2006, by naturalists Chris Atkins and Michael Taylor. It was found in a remote area of Redwood National Park. ==References== ==Other websites== * M.D. Vaden.com: Information about the Hyperion Coast Redwood Tree * BBC Radio documentary featuring Hyperion Category:Trees
title: Hyperion (tree)
